definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The bird pecked at the bread crumbs.
Dip into beaten eggs then dredge with seasoned bread crumbs.
sentences.chinese: 浸入打好的蛋液中，再捞出裹上面包屑。

sentences.english: I dare say we shall find our way home without the crumbs.
sentences.chinese: 我敢说没有这些恶面包屑我们也应能够找到回家的路。

sentences.english: He sighs, and wipes stray bread crumbs from his beard, rising to his cloven feet.
sentences.chinese: 他叹了口气，抹掉沾在胡子上的面包屑，翘起二郎腿。

sentences.english: Polpette are small meat balls rolled in bread crumbs.
sentences.chinese: 肉丸是外面裹着面包屑的小肉球。

sentences.english: After eating the loaf he whisked the crumbs off his coat.
sentences.chinese: 他吃完面包后，去外套上的面包屑。

sentences.english: The breaded and fried chicken is just as bad as burgers.
sentences.chinese: 裹满面包屑经过炸制的鸡肉跟汉堡包一样有害。

sentences.english: Breadcrumbs are useful in sites with multiple levels of web page hierarchy.
sentences.chinese: 面包屑对于多级别具有层次结构的网站特别有用。

sentences.english: He swept the crumbs off the table with his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他用手拂去桌面上的面包屑。

sentences.english: Mother brushed off the breadcrumbs and smoothed out the cloth.
sentences.chinese: 母亲把面包屑刷掉，把桌布拉平。

sentences.english: The mild, sweet onion varieties, like Vidalia and Walla Walla, are ideal in this dish, where they are stuffed with Parmesan cheese and bread crumbs.
sentences.chinese: 塞满了意大利干酪和面包屑吧。

sentences.english: Mix the white sesame and the crumbs.

sentences.chinese: 服务员清除桌上的面包屑。

sentences.english: For delicious fried chicken legs the secret is to bread the legs twice.
sentences.chinese: 制作诱人的炸鸡腿，秘诀就是在鸡腿上抹两次面包屑。
